${modID}:ExampleCard.NAME: Name
${modID}:ExampleCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: This will automatically be used if the card is upgraded. Remove it if unneeded.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: You can put more text in here.
If you need to use it for stuff.
Blizzard is a good example for this.

${modID}:ResistGuard.NAME: Resist Guard
${modID}:ResistGuard.DESCRIPTION: Remove all your block. NL You gain ${modID}:Damage_Resistance for 1 turn and can not gain block until the start of your next turn.
${modID}:ResistGuard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Remove all your block. NL You gain ${modID}:Damage_Resistance for 1 turn and can not gain block until the start of your next turn. NL Retain

${modID}:PerfectGuard.NAME: Perfect Guard
${modID}:PerfectGuard.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Reaction NL ${modID}:Resist the next attack by !B!. NL While in ${modID}:Tank, apply 2 Weak if you reduce damage to 0

${modID}:ALittleCollateralDamage.NAME: A Little Collateral Damage
${modID}:ALittleCollateralDamage.DESCRIPTION: While in ${modID}:Tank, deal !M! damage to ALL enemies whenever you deal damage.

${modID}:ResoluteCounter.NAME: Resolute Counter
${modID}:ResoluteCounter.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Reaction NL The next time you receive damage, deal !D! damage back to the attacker.

${modID}:TigerStoppingFist.NAME: Tiger Stopping Fist
${modID}:TigerStoppingFist.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Reaction NL Negate the next attack damage you receive and deal !D! ${modID}:heavy damage back to the attacker. NL Does more damage NL with less ${modID}:Heat.

${modID}:Finisher.NAME: Finisher
${modID}:Finisher.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! ${modID}:heavy damage. NL Gain [E] for each ${modID}:Rush_Combo you have. NL Put a *Double *Finisher in your hand.
${modID}:Finisher.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! ${modID}:heavy damage. NL Gain [E] for each ${modID}:Rush_Combo you have. NL Put a *Double *Finisher+ in your hand.

${modID}:DoubleFinisher.NAME: Double Finisher
${modID}:DoubleFinisher.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! ${modID}:heavy damage. NL Put a *Triple *Finisher in your hand. NL Exhaust

${modID}:TripleFinisher.NAME: Triple Finisher
${modID}:TripleFinisher.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! ${modID}:heavy damage. NL Gain !M! Heat. NL Exhaust

${modID}:EXRoadsideBrutality.NAME: EX Roadside Brutality
${modID}:EXRoadsideBrutality.DESCRIPTION: Retain Exhaust NL Spend !M! heat to deal !D! ${modID}:heavy damage. NL Put a copy of this card in your hand. NL ${modID}:Heat_Action
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: I can't do that! I don't have it in me!

${modID}:Taunt.NAME: Taunt
${modID}:Taunt.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! ${modID}:Heat. Apply 1 Strength and 1 Vulnerable to an enemy

${modID}:Repel.NAME: Repel
${modID}:Repel.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Reaction NL ${modID}:Parry damage that is !D! or lower. NL While in ${modID}:Bruiser, gain [E] next turn.

${modID}:EXUnyieldingCounter.NAME: EX Unyielding Counter
${modID}:EXUnyieldingCounter.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Reaction NL The next time you receive damage, spend 5 ${modID}:Heat to apply !M! Weak and deal !D! ${modID}:heavy damage back to the attacker.

${modID}:Reguard.NAME: Reguard
${modID}:Reguard.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Reaction NL The next time your block would be broken, gain !B! block.

${modID}:BoostAttack.NAME: Boost Attack
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: NL You can upgrade this card 3 more times.
NL You can upgrade this card 2 more times.
NL You can upgrade this card 1 more time.

${modID}:BoostDefense.NAME: Boost Defense
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: NL You can upgrade this card 3 more times.
NL You can upgrade this card 2 more times.
NL You can upgrade this card 1 more time.

${modID}:BreakfallAdept.NAME: Breakfall Adept
${modID}:BreakfallAdept.DESCRIPTION: Reaction NL When you receive Vulnerable, reduce it by half instead.
${modID}:BreakfallAdept.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Reaction NL When you receive Vulnerable, reduce it to none instead.

${modID}:DrunkenMomentum.NAME: Drunken Momentum
${modID}:DrunkenMomentum.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain 1 Energy for every 3 level of ${modID}:Drunk on you.
${modID}:DrunkenMomentum.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate NL At the start of your turn, gain 1 Energy for every 3 level of ${modID}:Drunk on you.

${modID}:EXDrunkenThrust.NAME: EX Drunken Thrust
${modID}:EXDrunkenThrust.DESCRIPTION: Spend !M! heat to deal !D! ${modID}:heavy damage. NL Deal more damage equal to double your drunk level. Attack always hit. Lose all Drunk NL ${modID}:Heat_Action
${modID}:EXDrunkenThrust.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Spend !M! heat to deal !D! ${modID}:heavy damage. NL Deal more damage equal to triple your drunk level. Attack always hit. Lose all Drunk NL ${modID}:Heat_Action
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: I can't do that! I don't have it in me!
